scripts.build: STELLAR_SCAFFOLD_ENV=staging stellar-scaffold build --build-clients && npm run install:contracts && astro build --mode=testnet
scripts.dev: STELLAR_SCAFFOLD_ENV=development stellar-scaffold build --build-clients && npm run install:contracts && astro dev
scripts.build:prebuilt-contracts: mkdir -p server/prebuilt_contracts && stellar-scaffold build --manifest-path Cargo.toml && cp target/wasm32v1-none/release/xasset.wasm server/prebuilt_contracts/xasset_standard.wasm && stellar-scaffold build --features mercury --manifest-path Cargo.toml && cp target/wasm32v1-none/release/xasset.wasm server/prebuilt_contracts/xasset_mercury.wasm
scripts.dev:with-prebuilt: npm run build:prebuilt-contracts && STELLAR_SCAFFOLD_ENV=development stellar-scaffold build --build-clients && npm run install:contracts && astro dev
scripts.build:with-prebuilt: npm run build:prebuilt-contracts && STELLAR_SCAFFOLD_ENV=staging stellar-scaffold build --build-clients && npm run install:contracts && astro check && astro build
scripts.install:contracts: npm run install:all-contracts && npm run build:all-contracts
scripts.build:all-contracts: npm run foreach-contract -- npm run build
